testcase.name: Verity that Auth token API works for various combinations
testcase.system-out: Given user sets base URI and sets endpoint path as "/auth/realms/sandbox/protocol/openid-connect/token".passed Then user sets "Content-Type" as "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" as header.passed And user sets body params for "grant_type" as "client_credentials"..........passed And user sets body params for "client_id" as "b2b640b5-c68c-4cb0-863b-20f1aec8af21".passed And user sets body params for "client_secret" as "0b83fb21-56f8-45fd-bad8-7a59d6bd978e".passed When user makes "POST" request to endpoint..................................passed Then user validates status code as 200......................................passed Then user validates that API should work for "Authorization" as "true"......passed
